languages.text: {n}...вы различаете жабоподобных ксеносов, возводящих вокруг дыры храм. Они молятся, проводят обряды, приносят тьме жертвы в надежде на невообразимые дары. Затем глаза снова застилает тьма. Точнее — вы и есть тьма. Что-то неизмеримо огромное, бесконечное, способное дотянуться до самых далеких звезд или поглотить галактику. Но чужая воля вырывает вас из уютных объятий пустоты, тянет на свет... И видение обрывается, а чувство скорби заполняет вас изнутри.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Снова смена образов. Вы различаете жабоподобных ксеносов, возводящих вокруг дыры храм. Они молятся, проводят обряды, приносят Тьме жертвы и получают от нее невообразимые дары.{/n}
traits.speaker: Бездонный провал

languages.text: {n}...you make out toadlike xenos building a temple around the pit. They are praying, conducting rites, making sacrifices to the darkness in hopes of unimaginable gifts. Then darkness shrouds everything once more. Or rather, you are the darkness. Something immeasurably vast, endless, capable of reaching the farthest stars or swallowing a galaxy. But some will pulls you out of the cosy embrace of the void, toward the light... And you snap out of the vision as sorrow fills you from within.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...вы различаете жабоподобных ксеносов, возводящих вокруг дыры храм. Они молятся, проводят обряды, приносят тьме жертвы в надежде на невообразимые дары. Затем глаза снова застилает тьма. Точнее — вы и есть тьма. Что-то неизмеримо огромное, бесконечное, способное дотянуться до самых далеких звезд или поглотить галактику. languages.text: {n}……你看到一群像蛤蟆一样的异形正在深渊周围建造神殿。它们正在祈祷，举行仪式，向黑暗献祭，渴望得到难以想象的礼物。随后，黑暗再次笼罩了一切。或者说，你就是那片黑暗本身，是某种极其庞大、无穷无尽、无法估量的东西，能够抵达最远的群星，或是吞噬整个星系。但随后，某种意识将你从舒适的虚空之中拉了出来，引导你走向光明……当你从幻象中清醒过来时，你的内心深处充满了悲伤。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...you make out toadlike xenos building a temple around the pit. They are praying, conducting rites, making sacrifices to the darkness in hopes of unimaginable gifts. Then darkness shrouds everything once more. Or rather, you are the darkness. Something immeasurably vast, endless, capable of reaching the farthest stars or swallowing a galaxy. But some will pulls you out of the cosy embrace of the void, toward the light... And you snap out of the vision as sorrow fills you from within.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}……你看到一群像蛤蟆一样的异形正在深渊周围建造神殿。它们正在祈祷，举行仪式，向黑暗献祭，渴望得到难以想象的礼物。随后，黑暗再次笼罩了一切。或者说，你就是那片黑暗本身，是某种极其庞大、无穷无尽、无法估量的东西，能够抵达最远的群星，或是吞噬整个星系。但随后，某种意识将你从舒适的虚空之中拉了出来，引导你走向光明……当你从幻象中清醒过来时，你的内心深处充满了悲伤。{/n}
traits.speaker: Бездонный провал

languages.text: {n}... ves xenos de aspecto similar a sapos construyendo un templo en torno al pozo. Rezan, celebran ritos y ofrecen sacrificios a la oscuridad, esperando recibir regalos inimaginables. La oscuridad lo cubre todo otra vez. Mejor dicho: te conviertes en la oscuridad. Eres algo inconmensurablemente grande, infinito, capaz de llegar a las estrellas más lejanas y de engullir una galaxia. Pero una voluntad externa te arranca del agradable abrazo del vacío y te arrastra hacia la luz... Despiertas de la visión, inundad{mf|o|a} por un pesar insoportable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...you make out toadlike xenos building a temple around the pit. They are praying, conducting rites, making sacrifices to the darkness in hopes of unimaginable gifts. Then darkness shrouds everything once more. Or rather, you are the darkness. Something immeasurably vast, endless, capable of reaching the farthest stars or swallowing a galaxy. But some will pulls you out of the cosy embrace of the void, toward the light... And you snap out of the vision as sorrow fills you from within.{/n}

Eres algo inconmensurablemente grande, infinito, capaz de llegar a las estrellas más lejanas y de engullir una galaxia. Pero una voluntad externa te arranca del agradable abrazo del vacío y te arrastra hacia la luz... Despiertas de la visión, inundad{mf|o|a} por un pesar insoportable.{/n}
traits.speaker: Бездонный провал

languages.text: {n}…あなたは、穴の周りに神殿を建てているヒキガエルのような異種族の姿をかろうじて認識する。彼らは祈り、儀式を執り行い、想像できない贈り物を期待して暗闇に生贄をささげる。そして、再び闇がすべてを覆い尽くす。より的確に言えば、あなた自身が闇だ。それは計り知れないほど広大で、無限で、最も遠い星に達することも、銀河を飲み込むこともできるもの。しかし、ある意志があなたを虚空の心地良い抱擁から光へと引き離す…そして悲しみが内側から満ちてくるにつれ、あなたはビジョンから飛び出す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...you make out toadlike xenos building a temple around the pit. They are praying, conducting rites, making sacrifices to the darkness in hopes of unimaginable gifts. Then darkness shrouds everything once more. Or rather, you are the darkness. Something immeasurably vast, endless, capable of reaching the farthest stars or swallowing a galaxy. But some will pulls you out of the cosy embrace of the void, toward the light... And you snap out of the vision as sorrow fills you from within.{/n}

traits.speaker: Бездонный провал

languages.text: {n}... du erkennst krötenartige Xenos, die einen Tempel um das Loch errichten. Sie beten, führen Rituale durch und opfern der Dunkelheit, in der Hoffnung auf unvorstellbare Geschenke. Dann umhüllt die Dunkelheit wieder alles. Das heißt, vielmehr bist du die Dunkelheit. Etwas unmessbar Weites, Endloses, das die entferntesten Sterne erreichen oder eine Galaxie verschlucken kann. Doch irgendein Wille zieht dich aus der angenehmen Umarmung der Leere zum Licht ... Und als Traurigkeit dich von ihnen erfüllt, bricht die Vision plötzlich ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...you make out toadlike xenos building a temple around the pit. They are praying, conducting rites, making sacrifices to the darkness in hopes of unimaginable gifts. Then darkness shrouds everything once more. Or rather, you are the darkness. Something immeasurably vast, endless, capable of reaching the farthest stars or swallowing a galaxy. But some will pulls you out of the cosy embrace of the void, toward the light... And you snap out of the vision as sorrow fills you from within.{/n}

Etwas unmessbar Weites, Endloses, das die entferntesten Sterne erreichen oder eine Galaxie verschlucken kann. Doch irgendein Wille zieht dich aus der angenehmen Umarmung der Leere zum Licht ... Und als Traurigkeit dich von ihnen erfüllt, bricht die Vision plötzlich ab.{/n}
traits.speaker: Бездонный провал

languages.text: {n}... vous distinguez des xénos à l'allure de crapauds qui construisent un temple près de la fosse. Ils prient, conduisent des rites, accomplissent des sacrifices aux ténèbres dans l'espoir d'obtenir des dons inimaginables. Puis l'obscurité recouvre tout une nouvelle fois. Ou plutôt, vous êtes l'obscurité. Une entité incommensurablement vaste, sans fin, capable d'atteindre les étoiles les plus éloignées ou de dévorer des galaxies. Mais une certaine volonté vous extirpe de l'étreinte rassurante du vide, vous guide vers la lumière... Et vous émergez de la vision tandis qu'un sentiment de chagrin vous envahit de l'intérieur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...you make out toadlike xenos building a temple around the pit. They are praying, conducting rites, making sacrifices to the darkness in hopes of unimaginable gifts. Then darkness shrouds everything once more. Or rather, you are the darkness. Something immeasurably vast, endless, capable of reaching the farthest stars or swallowing a galaxy. But some will pulls you out of the cosy embrace of the void, toward the light... And you snap out of the vision as sorrow fills you from within.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kurbağayı andıran zenoların çukurun etrafında bir tapınak inşa ettiğini görüyorsun. Hayal bile edilemeyecek armağanların beklentisiyle karanlığa dua ediyor, ayin yapıyor ve kurban veriyorlar. Sonrasında karanlık, bir kez daha her yeri sarıyor. Daha doğrusu, karanlık bizzat sensin. Bu karanlık, ölçülemeyecek kadar engin ve sonsuz... En uzak yıldızlara uzanabilecek, hatta koca bir galaksiyi yutabilecek kudrette. Ancak bir irade sayesinde uçsuzun sıcacık bağrından kopup ışığa yöneliyorsun... Görü bir anda son bulurken içini bir keder kaplıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...you make out toadlike xenos building a temple around the pit. They are praying, conducting rites, making sacrifices to the darkness in hopes of unimaginable gifts. Then darkness shrouds everything once more. Or rather, you are the darkness. Something immeasurably vast, endless, capable of reaching the farthest stars or swallowing a galaxy. But some will pulls you out of the cosy embrace of the void, toward the light... And you snap out of the vision as sorrow fills you from within.{/n}
